extension.summary: Provider de subtitrari subs.ro pentru Kodi
extension.description: Search and download subtitles from subs.ro - the largest Romanian subtitle database. Supports Romanian, English and many other languages.
Cauta si descarca subtitrari de pe subs.ro - cea mai mare baza de date de subtitrari romanesti. Suporta romana, engleza si multe alte limbi.
extension.news: v1.0.0 - Initial release - Search by IMDB ID, title, release name - Support for Romanian, English and 8 other languages - ZIP and RAR archive extraction - TV show season/episode filtering
